analysis.description:
GPCToken.refundTokens (/unique_chucks/24/0xa7b47854e6a99c83e190f94a460494ea28418718.sol#365-375) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(_refund,_value) (/unique_chucks/24/0xa7b47854e6a99c83e190f94a460494ea28418718.sol#371)
GPCToken.totalSupply (/unique_chucks/24/0xa7b47854e6a99c83e190f94a460494ea28418718.sol#233-237) should be declared external
Token.totalSupply (/unique_chucks/24/0xa7b47854e6a99c83e190f94a460494ea28418718.sol#56-57) should be declared external
